des:
The MERCUSYS Router skill for Alexa makes managing your home network simpler and more convenient than ever before:
- Pause the Wi-Fi for some time when you need to cut the internet distractions
- Pause the Wi-Fi for the children's devices at bedtime.
- Enable the guest network when friends come over
- Turn off the router’s LEDs at night
 
To get started with the MERCUSYS Router skill:
1. Prepare an AVS (Alexa Voice Service) enabled device such as Amazon Echo, Amazon Tap or Echo Dot.
2. Get an Alexa-supported MERCUSYS product. 
3. Have a MERCUSYS ID bound to this MERCUSYS product. This MERCUSYS ID is the MERCUSYS account you used to manage your MERCUSYS products. You can register a MERCUSYS ID on product’s web management page or via MERCUSYS app.
4. Enable this skill by following instructions in MERCUSYS App.
 
Some commands supported by MERCUSYS routers:
• Alexa, pause the WI-FI for John's phone for 3 hours
• Alexa, enable the internet for Junior's phone for 30 minutes
• Alexa, turn on/off guest wifi

Note: Functions may differ between different MERCUSYS products. If you have any questions, please contact https://www.mercusys.com/support
